WorkItem.Description:
The latest release includes some reflection code that is using a 4.5 only method. 

To address:
* Implement conditional compilation
* Develop alternate code-lines for affected areas
* Produce updated 0.2.0 release for as many .NET versions as possible.

Target Frameworks: .NET 4, .NET 3.5 and Mono 2.10.x
Nice to Have: .NET 3.0 and .NET 2.0

Note: this is an out-of-band fix and may delay later releases but by putting this in place today I will be in a better place to ensure more universal support in future releases.
